tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review:
Dr. Achi Ashok Greenview medical centre Bangalore
Dr. Achi Ashok is my gynaecologist she is available in Greenview Medical centre Bangalore , she is not just a best gynaecologist but also a very good human being. she is so dedicated and compassionate towards her professional. The moment you start to consult her she used to say “ now it’s my baby u stop worrying about the baby and be happy” she gives her whole and sole to save the baby. She had given me confidence and moral support through our the delivery process. She is just like a goddess to me. God bless you mem.
Dr Sterla: she is one of the best and most genuine JR doctor, she works with dr Achi and helped me to understand the whole delivery process, she was there for me for whole 9 months as friend and guided me on each step of the pregnancy and post pregnancy recovery. Thanks a lot mem. God bless you with all the happiness. Keep in touch.
Sister Lila : she works as cashier for Achi mem, she is very friendly to us she made all the billing process very simple and easy for me and my husband. Thanks .
Staff members: day staff is good, however hospital should work in night staff members and hire more experts staff than they have now.
Hospital: hospital should bring more facility and renovations on building rooms and swing given for baby. Should be more fancy and delivery is very happy experience for mom and dad so give some more fun like playing decoration in baby birth some gifts and all.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: She was very practical and suggested the correct treatment. My previous doc asked me to do hysteroscopy stating septate uterus but she found the correct diagnosis and she is treating me. We need to wait long hours but worth the wait. Mam thank you much......

tags: Treatment satisfaction,
review:
****** ** ********* *** the support staff is arrogant, no coordination between departments, each floor has different rules for attending patients. ********** *** **** ************ *** *** ************ *** ********************* *** *** **** 

but....helping staff are very rude, they got NO basic etiquette.

tags: None
review:
My sister visited this doctor. This doctor made an insensitive comment on personal life issue of the patient. She laughed at the painful situation of the patient, which was very depressing. It was completely unacceptable for a doctor of this stature.
The staff is utterly confused who in fact forced an appointment even if we insisted just for diagnostic test. No coordination among the staff. 
And finally when the report came out it was showing a completely different condition not just slight difference in numbers. We had to retest in different centers to confirm the right condition.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Treatment satisfaction,
review: My first delivery was taken care by Achi madam who ensures that I go through normal delivery process even though I had complications..... She had given me confidence and moral support through our the delivery process.... Which in turn resulted in normal delivery of healthy baby. I am visiting her for my second delivery as well bcoz of the confidence I got on her treatment.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: i would highly recommend Achi Ashok mam for any Gynecologic problems , she is really sweet with her patients and the way of explaining the problem to a patient is very very good, recently i have contacted through phone due to COVID-19 , i was unable to go to hospital, her response to me in phone was very good but where she follows her hospital rules strictly :) coz i asked for her mail id ,she said she is not using any mail id \"LOL\

tags: Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: I went to meet Dr.Achi for painful periods. I had normal periods with 3 day flow. This time it was painful and 1st day flow was more. For this she recommended taking preg test. Even after saying flow was normal she suggested taking the test. I won't recommend this doc.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: I would highly recommend her. She did deliveries for both of our kids.  She remembers all details throughout and gives personal attention.  She guides very well in any gyne related stuff. She explains things very directly which helps a lot. Very friendly, efficient doctor.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Wait time,
review:
She is one of the best doctors, the way he gives the advice is really caring. Blessed to get such kind of doctors. 

Hospital is little expensive and since we have gone there through insurance, its fine, for the normal people this is expensive. Little reduction in amount would be good. 

Think this decision cannot be taken by the doctor, but hospital / management needs to consider it.

tags: Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: Consulted for above problem ***** *** ** ** ******  ******After taking so many tests mam refer to another doctor in the same hospital no counselling from the mam regarding problem highlighted in medical reports we consulted gynecologists but he refer us to physicians

Dr. Achi ashok has responded well based on the symptoms told to her, she has also given few guidance and care to be taken during the next few months. 

After speaking to her the confidence level of having healthy pregnancy has increased.

Thanks !!!

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: visited the doctor thrice & everytime it's same awful experience (only reason to repeated visit closer to home) they speak with other Drs in their mother tongue & explain or share nothing to the patients about prognosis unless you know her language.highly qualified * **** ****** ** *** ************** ***** **** **** **** ** ******* ** ***** **** ****** ** ** **** ******** ** ******* **** ***** * ****** ********* **** **** **** **** ********** *** ** ********* *** ******* ******** **** *** **** ***** * *****

None
review: We have waited for more than 1.25 hours to meet the doctor. While waiting we contacted the reception person; why we need to wait for more than 1.25 hours. Lady was asking us to ask the doctor. This is not the first time.This i feel inappropriate; because we are there to consult with doctor; we can't ask doctor why u r asking us to wait for hours.Either the receptionist or management has to address this problem;; then what's the use of taking appointment?Doctor has to take care of timings;

review: She is like a mother. Have been going to her for the past 10years.she is an angel sent to earth. Can't thank her enough. The awesome Dr. Achi

review: She's very kind and good enough,generous towards patient,,,even though her time is up and if there is any patients waiting ,she ll finish with all of them with their problems.in case if any emergency call she ll wait till the patient comes to the hospital ,treats them and then ly she ll be winding up .Liked her and would suggest to many as well.

tags: Treatment satisfaction,Doctor friendliness,
review: My name is Arun. I visited Greenview hospital for my wife's pregnancy treatment. I found Dr.Achi Ashok as very good for us with the right treatment, better care and understanding of patient conditions. Thanks to the doctor and the faculties who where very helpful at the hospital.
